data.question: What is the chemical formula of NTHU-6?
What is the role of tmdp molecules in the structure of NTHU-6?
data.answer: The tmdp molecules, being diprotonated (H2tmdp2+), along with lattice water molecules, balance the charge of the anionic hybrid framework of NTHU-6.

data.question: True or False: NTHU-6 can maintain its structure up to 250 °C.
What is the PL quantum efficiency (PLQE) of NTHU-6?
How are the Ga6(OH)4O26 clusters in NTHU-6 connected?
data.answer: The Ga6(OH)4O26 clusters are interlinked into microporous octahedral-ox hybrid sheets through bis-bidentate ox groups.

data.question: True or False: NTHU-6 exhibits a hillock-like absorption band extended into the visible region.
What is the CIE chromaticity coordinates of NTHU-6?
What is the synthesis temperature for NTHU-6?
True or False: The structure of NTHU-6 becomes amorphous over 280 °C.
What is the presumed role of the template in NTHU-6?
data.answer: The template is presumed to act as a sensitizer in assisting energy absorption and transfer.

data.question: True or False: NTHU-6 is the first hybrid open-framework structure with nanosized channels assembled from small organic oxalate linkers and large inorganic hexameric octahedral Ga-O clusters.
What is the synthesis method used for NTHU-6?
True or False: NTHU-6 has a higher PLQE than NTHU-4.
What is the significance of the disordered sites of Ga(5) in NTHU-6?
data.answer: The disordered sites of Ga(5) near extra large pores are correlated with the yellow emission of NTHU-6.

data.question: True or False: The organic species occluded in NTHU-6 are considered as activators for its luminescence.
What is the estimated interior nonframework space percentage of NTHU-6?
How does the emission spectrum of NTHU-6 compare to NTHU-4?
data.answer: NTHU-6 has an absolute PLQE of 42%, about 1.4 times that of NTHU-4.

data.question: True or False: The structure of NTHU-6 is composed of five independent Ga sites and six P sites.
What is the role of oxalate linkers in the structure of NTHU-6?
data.answer: Oxalate linkers are used to interlink the Ga6(OH)4O26 clusters into microporous octahedral-ox hybrid sheets.

data.question: What is the synthesis duration for NTHU-6?
